welcomePageDesc: This is an application that demonstrates how to use Redux and Material-UI in a React application.
mainCardDesc: This section displays a list of people and their information in a table. You can edit, update, and delete records, as well as add new people.
viewsCardDesc: This section displays the same information as the List View, but in a different format. People's information is displayed on cards.
addPersonTitle: Fill out information about the person
errorBioMaxCharacters: The maximum number of characters is 250
AlertTitle_NoPeople: There is no people to display
AlertDesc_NoPeople: You can add the first person here:
AlertDesc_404: The page you are looking for might have been removed or is temporarily unavailable.
